mapper.select: select hisId ,hisDate ,hisPeriod ,hisTitle ,hisContent ,hisNo from history where hisId = #{hisId} order by hisDate asc
select hisId ,hisDate ,hisPeriod ,hisTitle ,hisContent ,hisNo from history where hisId = #{hisId} and hisNo = #{hisNo}
select distinct hisDate from history where hisId = #{hisId} order by hisDate asc
select hisId ,hisDate ,hisPeriod ,hisTitle ,hisContent ,hisNo from history where hisId = #{hisId} and hisDate = #{hisDate}
select count(*) as "countPerYear" from history where hisId = #{hisId} and hisDate = #{hisDate}
mapper.delete: delete history where hisId=#{hisId} and hisNo=#{hisNo}
